name: Worm Goes to Hell
description:
Worm Goes to Hell is the first release from MTGJoeD - that's me! You can find me on YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, and all the other usual places on the internet. 

Come hang in my Discord: https://discord.gg/rEWKjQgZzx

You can reach me at business@mtgjoed.com

If you play the game and stream/record it, I'd love to see it! If you run into any bugs or weirdness, feel free to let me know and I'll add it to my to-do list.
